dict.string: Monday 1: Plain rice,2 chapathi, masoor dal tadka, cabbage porial or lemon coconut chicken
Tuesday 1: Plain rice , 2 chapathi, tuar dal tadka, palak paneer or chicken palak
Thursday 1: Plain rice , 2 utappam, mix vegetable sambar or chicken chettinadu
Friday 1: Pulav rice , 2 chapathi, chana masala or chicken masala ,sweet
Monday 2: Plain rice , 2 chapathi, masoor dal tadka, vegetable korma or chicken korma
Tuesday 2: Pulao rice , 2 chapathi, dal makhni , paneer makhni or chicken makhni
Thursday 2: Plain rice , 2 utappam, coriander dal, vegetable jalfrezi or chicken jalfrezi
Friday 2: Plain rice , 2 chapathi, bagara baingan or chicken hyderabadi, sweet
Monday 3: Plain rice , 2 chapathi, masoor dal tadka, vegetable poriyal or chicken kadai
Tuesday 3: Plain rice , 2 chapathi, green peas fry, paneer butter masala, chicken butter masala
Thursday 3: Plain rice , 2 utappam, moong dal tadka, vegetable kadi or chicken kadi
Friday 3: Pulao rice , 2 chapathi, saag paneer or saag chicken, sweet
